parameters.functionCode:
// Generate HTML Discharge Sheet const data = $input.first().json; const reconciled = data.reconciled; const conflicts = data.conflicts; const metadata = data.metadata; const html = ` Discharge Instructions

DISCHARGE INSTRUCTIONS

Generated: ${metadata.timestamp}

Patient Name: ${reconciled.patient.name} Date of Birth: ${reconciled.patient.dob}
MRN: ${reconciled.patient.mrn || 'N/A'} Appointment Date: ${reconciled.appointment.date}
${conflicts.length > 0 ? `
‚ö†Ô∏è Data Conflicts Detected (${conflicts.length}):
    ${conflicts.map(c => `
  • ${c.field}: ${c.resolution}
    • `).join('')}

Data Accuracy: ${metadata.accuracy}

` : ''}
DIAGNOSES
${reconciled.diagnoses.length > 0 ? reconciled.diagnoses.map(d => `
‚Ä¢ ${d}
`).join('') : '

No diagnoses documented

' }
PROCEDURES PERFORMED
${reconciled.procedures.length > 0 ? reconciled.procedures.map(p => `
‚Ä¢ ${p}
`).join('') : '

No procedures documented

' }
MEDICATIONS
${reconciled.medications.new.length > 0 ? `

NEW Medications:

${reconciled.medications.new.map(m => `
‚Ä¢ ${m}
`).join('')} ` : ''} ${reconciled.medications.continued.length > 0 ? `

CONTINUE Taking:

${reconciled.medications.continued.map(m => `
‚Ä¢ ${m}
`).join('')} ` : ''} ${reconciled.medications.discontinued.length > 0 ? `

STOP Taking:

${reconciled.medications.discontinued.map(m => `
‚Ä¢ ${m}
`).join('')} ` : ''} ${reconciled.medications.new.length === 0 && reconciled.medications.continued.length === 0 && reconciled.medications.discontinued.length === 0 ? '

No medication changes

' : '' }
ACTIVITY & WORK RESTRICTIONS
${reconciled.restrictions.length > 0 ? reconciled.restrictions.map(r => `
‚Ä¢ ${r}
`).join('') : '

No restrictions

' }
HOME CARE INSTRUCTIONS
${reconciled.homeInstructions.length > 0 ? reconciled.homeInstructions.map(i => `
‚Ä¢ ${i}
`).join('') : '

Standard post-visit care instructions apply

' }
FOLLOW-UP APPOINTMENTS
${reconciled.followUp.length > 0 ? reconciled.followUp.map(f => `
‚Ä¢ ${f}
`).join('') : '

No follow-up scheduled at this time

' }
ORDERS (Imaging, Labs, Referrals)
${reconciled.orders.imaging.length > 0 ? `

Imaging Orders:

${reconciled.orders.imaging.map(i => `
‚Ä¢ ${i}
`).join('')} ` : ''} ${reconciled.orders.labs.length > 0 ? `

Lab Orders:

${reconciled.orders.labs.map(l => `
‚Ä¢ ${l}
`).join('')} ` : ''} ${reconciled.orders.referrals.length > 0 ? `

Referrals:

${reconciled.orders.referrals.map(r => `
‚Ä¢ ${r}
`).join('')} ` : ''} ${reconciled.orders.imaging.length === 0 && reconciled.orders.labs.length === 0 && reconciled.orders.referrals.length === 0 ? '

No orders at this time

' : '' }

üö® WHEN TO SEEK IMMEDIATE MEDICAL ATTENTION:

${reconciled.redFlags.map(r => `
‚Ä¢ ${r}
`).join('')}

Staff Acknowledgment:

Staff Initials: _________________ Date: _________________

Document ID: ${reconciled.appointment.id} | Generated: ${metadata.timestamp}
Status: ${metadata.status} | Conflicts: ${metadata.totalConflicts}

`; return { json: { html, reconciled, conflicts, metadata } };
